text: The Provincial Highways of Sindh consists of all public highways maintained by Sindh province, Pakistan. The Sindh Highways Department under the Works & Services Department maintains over of roadways organised into various classifications which crisscross the province and provide access to major population centers.http://www.sindh.gov.pk/dpt/worksandservices/highway.htm These are not to be confused with national highways which are federal roads maintained by the Government of Pakistan and the National Highway Authority. ==List of Provincial Highways== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:auto; font- size:90%; align:center; text-align:center; width:90%" |colspan="12" bgcolor="#E0E0E0"|Provincial Highways of Sindh |- !
